content.description: Cool one-move wonder on the shorter boulder. Sit start in the middle of the boulder at a small one/two finger pocket. Big move to jugs then mantle onto the top.
content.location: Middle of the boulder at the obvious finger pocket.

content.description: Climbs shallow holds left of the blunt arete of Mr. Green.
content.location: The face between the arete and the easy ledges. Look for a pocket like feature.

content.description: Sit start at a big jug (as for Mr. Clean) then move up and right to a shallow pocket on the slab.
content.location: Starts in the low cave on the back side of the shorter boulder right on the trail.

content.description: Start low at pockets at the base of the slabby dihedral. Climb up and left along the dihedral to the top.
content.location: Climbs the slabby dihedral on the back side of the taller boulder.

content.description: Climbs decent holds up the blunt arete facing the trail on the taller boulder.
content.location: Starts right off the trail on good holds. Climbs up the blunt arete on the tallest part of the taller boulder.

content.description: Sit start in the low cave on a big jug. Climb up and left along jug rail then mantle to the top. Short but sweet!
content.location: Starts in the low cave on the back side of the shorter boulder right in the middle of the trail.

content.description: Fun moves up the right side of the shorter boulder. Sit start at undercling crack. Grab hidden crack/pocket and fun features to the top.
content.location: On the shorter boulder. Climbs features on the right side of the face.

content.description: Climbs the right side of the boulder. Start as for Industry but move right to a cool layback hold and up to the top.
content.location: Right edge of the boulder at undercling. Climb's the right edge of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start a cool flake feature on the right side of the gently overhanging face. Move to great horizontal ledge holds then pop to a hidden pocket over the lip. Mantle onto the top.
content.location: Climbs the right side of the overhanging face of the taller boulder (just above the creek).

content.description: Start low on the left arete. Bump up to the lip and mantle over the top.
content.location: Climbs the left arete of the overhanging face on the downhill side of the taller boulder.

content.description: Layback up the crack to the top.
content.location: Climbs the layback crack on the creek side of the left hand boulder.

content.description: These two short but fun boulders sit in a shady hemlock grove along a tributary to Norris Brook. A peaceful spot minus the noise from the factory that sits on top of the hill above the boulders.
